alert.note: Alert for Coastal Broward County; Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Broward County; Metro Palm Beach County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 6:44PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Miami-Dade, Broward and southeastern Palm Beach Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 644 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Loxahatchee NWR to Mile Marker 30 On Alligator Alley to 10 miles northeast of Dade-Collier Training Airport. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Lauderdale, Pembroke Pines, Hollywood, Miramar, Coral Springs, West Palm Beach, Pompano Beach, Davie, Plantation, Sunrise, Boca Raton, Deerfield Beach, Boynton Beach, Delray Beach, Tamarac, Wellington, Margate, Lake Worth, Lighthouse Point and Palm Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
